name: 蒼葉（子供）
message: "Granny... When are you coming hooome... Uuuh..."

name: 蒼葉（子供）
message: "You said you'd be here at five... Granny..."

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "There you are. I looked all over for you. ...Hey, your eyes are all red. Were you crying?"

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "It's okay, just take it slow. I'll wait."

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "Okay, okay, you're not. So, what's wrong? What happened?"

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "Liar. If you don't tell me, I'll tell Ms. Tae you've been telling lies again."

name: 蒼葉（子供）
message: "She said she'd be here by five..."

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "It'll be okay. She probably just got busy. I'm sure she'll be home soon, so don't cry."

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "Right, right, you're not crying. Oh, I know, why don't we play until Ms. Tae gets home?"

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "Time flies when you're having fun, right?"

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "Even when you're sad or lonely, you can't give up. We have to get strong, so we can keep Ms. Tae and my mom safe."

name: 紅雀（子供）
message: "Right, let's start by seeing who can go highest on the swings!"
